message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to you, just like it does to you. After careful consideration and evaluation of its worth, I propose to sell this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to ensure you have the opportunity to acquire something of such significant importance at a competitive rate. I trust that this proposal will be favorable to you and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering this unique opportunity.
